project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Create a command-line application for managing a contact book. Users will be able to add, search, update, and delete contacts, with the data stored in a JSON file.

task.name: Implement the feature to add contacts
Implement the feature to search for contacts
Implement the feature to update contacts
Implement the feature to delete contacts
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
